sql-list.sql: <表单名>保护版本及定值申请总表</表单名> <今日申请单数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BBJDZJBXX A WHERE A.BBLX = '10' AND TBRQ LIKE'%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE B.BWFQGZID = A.BWFQID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID);</今日申请单数> <今日流转中数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BBJDZJBXX A WHERE A.BBLX = '10' AND TBRQ LIKE'%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE B.BWFQGZID = A.BWFQID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID AND B.ZLZT NOT IN('10','50','80'));</今日流转中数> <今日归档数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BBJDZJBXX A WHERE A.BBLX = '10' AND TBRQ LIKE'%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE B.BWFQGZID = A.BWFQID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID AND B.ZLZT='40');</今日归档数> <月累计启动数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BBJDZJBXX A WHERE A.BBLX = '10' AND TBRQ LIKE'%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE B.BWFQGZID = A.BWFQID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID);</月累计启动数> <月累计归档数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BBJDZJBXX A WHERE A.BBLX = '10' AND TBRQ LIKE'%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE B.BWFQGZID = A.BWFQID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID AND B.ZLZT='40');</月累计归档数>

<表单名>水电厂水库基本参数填报表</表单名> <今日申请单数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_SDCSKJBXX A WHERE A.TBRQ LIKE '%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE A.BWFQID = B.BWFQGZID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID);</今日申请单数> <今日流转中数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_SDCSKJBXX A WHERE A.TBRQ LIKE '%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE A.BWFQID = B.BWFQGZID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID AND B.ZLZT NOT IN('10','50','80'));</今日流转中数> <今日归档数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_SDCSKJBXX A WHERE A.TBRQ LIKE '%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE A.BWFQID = B.BWFQGZID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID AND B.ZLZT ='40');</今日归档数> <月累计启动数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_SDCSKJBXX A WHERE A.TBRQ LIKE '%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE A.BWFQID = B.BWFQGZID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID);</月累计启动数> <月累计归档数>SELECT * FROM BWGZ_BWZB_SDCSKJBXX A WHERE A.TBRQ LIKE '%s' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BWGZ_BWZB_BWFQSBZLXX B WHERE A.BWFQID = B.BWFQGZID AND B.ID = A.SBZLID AND B.ZLZT ='40');</月累计归档数>
